name: Rudra: A Tale of Time
description:
A game made by students at the University of Utah.
Narrative
  • Live the story of Rudra. As a hero determined to protect humanity, you travel through the different Yugas(Eras) of the world to find the source of malignant corruption.
  • As you travel through the beautiful landscapes of each Yuga, cleanse the orbs of corruption blocking Ma Ganga’s flow. From the divine Satya Yuga to the darkest Kali Yuga, you will experience the full Chatur Yuga cycle.
  • As you progress, immerse yourself into the world of Hindu culture. Explore the inner workings of Chakras, stories from Hindu scripture, and much more.

Combat
  • You’ve faced enemies from the Nordic and Greek regions. Now it is time to face the evil from Hindu scriptures. Take on Pishachas, Rakshasas, Bhishani, and even Asuras!
  • Unleash the power of Varunastra, a gift from the gods. Use this legendary weapon to perform a variety of epic combos.
  • Use powerful incantations known as Mantras to aid you on the battlefield and morph Varunastra into several weapons from ancient India.

Features
  • Richly detailed world inspired by Hindu scriptures.
  • Epic storyline that takes you through the four Yugas of the universe.
  • Dynamic combat system that allows you to use Mantras and Varunastra to defeat your enemies.
  • Challenging boss battles against legendary creatures from Hindu scriptures.
  • Exploration of the inner workings of Chakras and stories from Hindu scripture.
  • Immersive soundscapes that transport you to a mystical realm.
  • Stunning graphics that bring the world to life.
